attributes.action: Mr Cameron should retract his comments regarding the police
attributes.additional_details: David Cameron should retract and apologise for his sickening comments that the riots are the fault of the police when they are working tirelessly, with minimal sleep, rest or food, in adverse conditions to protect us all while he sits in his comfortable office. Mr Cameron, please apologise and admit you got this wrong. The riots are the result of government policy combined with a failure in society and a lack of sense of community and are not due to police tactics.
